name: King God Castle
summary:
- Your luck will decide which hero you will strengthen
and which weapon will appear.
To use what is given efficiently to defeat enemies is
strategy and tactics!
Fostering and combining my own heroes!
- Choose the 6 most strategic heroes. Gold coins and
jewels from the battle.
Use them to strengthen your heroes and bring out your
potential.
Strengthening heroes through the power of the gods!
- Strengthen the altar to enlist the help of the gods. It's
the only thing that's gonna make the heroes the
strongest.
Choose an altar and gain divine power.
Enemies of various characteristics!
- Enemies using various characteristics and skills
invade. I don't know if I'm gonna use magic to wipe it
out.
It's up to you to take it down step by step.
I adjust the difficulty of my enemies. Challenge!
- You can use the challenge system to strengthen your
enemies and earn more rewards.
